comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Perhaps the grandson of en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Godfrey_Saxe mentioned in the Wikipedia article. From the Political Graveyard: Saxe, John Godfrey — also known as John G. Saxe — of Manhattan, New York County, N.Y. Lawyer; delegate to New York state constitutional convention 16th District, 1915; elected (Wet) delegate to New York convention to ratify 21st amendment 1933, but did not serve. Member, Tammany Hall. Burial location unknown.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Godfrey_Saxe_II John Godfrey Saxe II (1877-1953)
